title: Meta to Acquire Chinese Startup to Boost Advanced AI
description: Meta ⁠has announced it will acquire the Chinese artificial intelligence startup Manus, as the technology giant accelerates efforts to integrate advanced AI across its platforms.
content:
Meta ⁠said on Monday it would acquire the Chinese artificial intelligence startup Manus, as the technology giant accelerates efforts to integrate advanced AI across its platforms.

title: Meta to acquire Chinese startup Manus to boost advanced AI features
description: Meta is acquiring Chinese artificial intelligence startup Manus. This move aims to speed up the integration of advanced AI across Meta's platforms. Manus develops a general-purpose AI agent capable of independent task execution. Meta plans to operate and sell the Manus service. It will also be integrated into Meta's consumer and business products.

title: The AI scorecard: How the US built a lead-and could lose it to China
description: If the U.S.-China artificial-intelligence rivalry were a football game, America would be leading at halftime—but it just made a risky trade.
content:

title: Bulls Only: Every Wall Street analyst now predicts a stock rally
description: Wall Street experts predict a strong rally for the US stock market in 2026. This would mark four consecutive years of gains. Despite concerns about artificial intelligence and economic shifts, strategists are largely optimistic. The S&P 500 is expected to see further growth. This positive outlook is supported by a resilient economy and strong corporate earnings.

title: Amid market tumult, state treasurers play it safe
description: As the U.S. economy shows signs of slowing and market jitters rise over a bubble around artificial intelligence companies, state treasurers tasked with shepherding billions of dollars in public funds say they are safely hedged against any potential market corrections. In interviews, many treasurers said their investment strategies are pegged to long-term goals, designed to […]
